results.name: Inverse of permutation in A167151.
comment: For n > 0: A232739(n) = a(A232739(n+1))/2. - _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 04 2013
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
xref: Cf. also A005228, A030124, A232739, A232746, A232747, A232749, and also the permutation pair A232751/A232752.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 17 2013
